messages.content: Dear Resident, May I introduce myself as your prospective parliamentary candidate representing the UK Independence Party. I am married with three grown up children and live in Rochdale. I have a good track record in community and comprehensive schools. I have also been involved with various voluntary organisations. I am a working-class person - not from the ruling elite. I am not new to the Rochdale constituency.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Quit the European Union and give independence to the British people.
Ensure the NHS remains free at the point of delivery.
More investment in social housing to meet growing demand.
More investment in careers advice and apprenticeships for the young.

issues.brexitEurope: Quit the European Union and give independence to the British people.
issues.health: Ensure the NHS remains free at the point of delivery.

housing.content: More investment in social housing to meet growing demand.

leaflet.personalStatement: I am a working-class person - not from the ruling elite. I am not new to the Rochdale constituency. I am married with three grown up children and live in Rochdale.

politicalExperience.role: Chair of a partnership school in Oldham
politicalExperience.achievements: I have a good track record in community and comprehensive schools.
